analyzed: @207b #// rgya gar skad du /

analyzed: a'arya sapta be ta da ka n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
analyzed: 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs /

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /🔽phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i @208a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te / phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i @208a *//
translated: The Blessed One was dwelling on Vulture Peak Mountain in Rājagṛha with a great saṅgha of 250 monks.

original: dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yang thabs cig go /
analyzed: dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yang thabs cig go /
translated: He was also together with the venerable ascetic Ānanda, who was following behind.

original: de'i tshe na mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gnod par bya ba'i phyir ro langs chen po bdun btang bar gyur to //
analyzed: de'i tshe na mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gnod par bya ba'i phyir ro langs chen po bdun btang bar gyur to //
translated: At that time, the wandering non-Buddhists sent out seven great zombies to harm the Blessed One.

original: de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba las de dag gis glags ma rnyed /
analyzed: de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba las de dag gis glags ma rnyed /
translated: They went to the Blessed One, but they could not find an opportunity.

original: dmigs pa ma rnyed do //
analyzed: dmigs pa ma rnyed do //
translated: They could not find an opportunity.

original: de dag gis glags ma rnyed /🔽dmigs pa ma rnyed nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i lus la reg go /
analyzed: de dag gis glags ma rnyed / dmigs pa ma rnyed nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i lus la reg go /
translated: They could not find an opportunity.🔽They went to where the venerable Ānanda was and touched his body.

original: reg ma thag tu kun dga' bo de sdug bsngal mi bzod pa /
analyzed: reg ma thag tu kun dga' bo de sdug bsngal mi bzod pa /
translated: As soon as they touched him, Ānanda was overwhelmed by unbearable suffering,

original: drag pa / tsha ba /
analyzed: drag pa / tsha ba /

original: shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan par gyur to; ;de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te /🔽bdag ni / sdug bsngal mi bzad pa /
analyzed: shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan par gyur to; ;de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te / bdag ni / sdug bsngal mi bzad pa /

original: drag pa / tsha ba /
analyzed: drag pa / tsha ba /
translated: “I am overwhelmed by unbearable suffering,🔽pain, and agony.

original: shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan no; ;bcom ldan 'das de ma dgongs so //
analyzed: shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan no; ;bcom ldan 'das de ma dgongs so //
translated: The Blessed One has not considered this.

original: bdag 'di ltar nyam nga bar gyur na /
analyzed: bdag 'di ltar nyam nga bar gyur na /
translated: Since I am in such a predicament,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so snyam mo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so snyam mo //
translated: the Tathāgata has not considered this.”

original: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa moo gal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par gyur to //
analyzed: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa moo gal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par gyur to //
translated: At that time, the Venerable Śāriputra, the Venerable Mahāmaudgalyāyana, and the Venerable Ānanda were not far from each other.

original: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i nye ba'i nyon @208b mongs pa de lta bu de tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa moo gal gyi bu chen pos thos so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i nye ba'i nyon @208b mongs pa de lta bu de tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa moo gal gyi bu chen pos thos so //
translated: The Venerable Śāriputra and the Venerable Mahāmaudgalyāyana heard the Venerable Ānanda's distress.

original: de nas de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the two of them went to where the Venerable Ānanda was and, having arrived, said this:

original: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo /🔽sdug bsngal mi bzad pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo / sdug bsngal mi bzad pa /
translated: Venerable Ānanda,🔽why do you say, 'Having experienced unbearable,

original: drag pa / tsha ba'i tshor ba myong nas bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so zhes ci de skad smra'am /
analyzed: drag pa / tsha ba'i tshor ba myong nas bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so zhes ci de skad smra'am /
translated: intense, and sharp pain, the Tathāgata does not pay attention to me'?🔽When this was said, the Venerable Ānanda said to them:

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag /

original: bdag gi lus la tshor ba dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: bdag gi lus la tshor ba dang ldan pa ni /

original: dper na / sog les mgo bo gsheg pa ltar kun dga' bo la reg pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: dper na / sog les mgo bo gsheg pa ltar kun dga' bo la reg pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: is like being cut with a knife.”

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /

original: ma 'jigs shig /
analyzed: ma 'jigs shig /

original: bdag cag gis khyod khri'i steng du bzhag ste /
analyzed: bdag cag gis khyod khri'i steng du bzhag ste /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bkur ro //

original: bcom ldan 'das de khyod la yongs su skyob pa mdzad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de khyod la yongs su skyob pa mdzad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The Blessed One will completely protect you.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa moo gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nyal khri'i steng du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhag go /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa moo gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nyal khri'i steng du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhag go /
translated: Then the venerable Śāriputra and the venerable Mahā­maudgalyāyana carried the venerable Ānanda on a bed to where the Blessed One was. When they arrived, they placed him in front of the Blessed One.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the venerable Ānanda,

analyzed: ro langs re res kyang 'dod na rkang pa g-yon pa'i mthe bos ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang 'phen to //

original: 'byung po thams cad dang / brjed byed dang / sems rnam par g-yeng byed la sogs pa dang / dug byin pa dang / dug byas pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams la kun tu 'gro ba grub pa'i mchog yin no; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
analyzed: 'byung po thams cad dang / brjed byed dang / sems rnam par g-yeng byed la sogs pa dang / dug byin pa dang / dug byas pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams la kun tu 'gro ba grub pa'i mchog yin no; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /

original: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //🔽'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////🔽rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shuddha sim ha dang / bandhe ye shes snying po'i sdes bsgyur /🔽rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidy'a ka ra sim ha dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa /
